shareText:
🚀 Earn with TON Mining! 💎

I’ve started mining Ton coins using the [TON] app, and it’s super simple! Check it out and share your link to earn extra bonuses!

✨Special Offer: Join now and receive a 💰 gift of 500 nanotons as a welcome bonus!

Join me on this exciting crypto journey! 🌟✨

Hands-Free Earnings with Auto Claim

Enable Auto Claim for just 1 TON and let the app do the collecting for you, day and night! Enjoy 20 days of automated earnings—no more manual claims needed!

This is now in development phase, will be available soon.

payment.boost_activation_success: Your mining boost will be activated in a few minutes. You will receive a direct message on Telegram once it's ready.

purchases_boosts_info: Boosts you have purchased are shown here, they are activated in the order in which they are displayed,after the expiration of the period they are automatically deleted.

withdraw_info:
Withdrawal Requirements

To access the withdrawal feature, users must meet the following conditions:

1. Minimum Balance: Accumulate at least 30 Ton coins.
 2. Active Use: Be active in the app for at least one month.
 3. Community Membership: Join our official communities to stay informed and connected.
tib_coin_info_tooltip: Tib Coin is an innovative cryptocurrency designed to deliver seamless, secure transactions with enhanced accessibility for everyday users. Currently in its development phase, Tib Coin is gearing up for a market launch soon, aiming to make digital transactions faster, more reliable, and globally inclusive.
